channel.title: [1.6.2] GobsLegend [24/7] [No Lag] [FactionsPVP] [McMMO] [Economy]
channel.description:
[center][size=7][B][U]GobsLegend[/U][/B][/size]
[URL=http://s1108.photobucket.com/user/audioskater2/media/BannerCURRENT_zps09b29847.png.html][IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h416/audioskater2/BannerCURRENT_zps09b29847.png[/img][/URL]
[size=5][u]Features[/u][/size]
[SIZE=4][b]24/7 No Lag Factions PVP Economy McMMO Jobs Griefing & Raiding Anti-Cheat & Anti-XRay[/b][/SIZE]
[size=5][u]Server Specs[/u][/size]
[SIZE=4][B]4GB DDR3 Ram Intel Xeon Quad Core CPU 3.60 GHz 1 GBPS Uplink 30 Mbps Upload Speed[/B][/SIZE]
[size=5][u]Premium Ranks[/u][/size]
[B][SIZE=4]VIP = $10.00 Noble = $25.00 Guardian = $50.00 Hero = $75.00 Legend = $100.00 King = $150.00[/SIZE][/B]
[size=5][u]Rules[/u][/size]
[size=4][B][U]Player Rules[/U]
1. Be respectful to others 2. No racism 3. No flooding chat 4. No spamming 5. No advertising 6. No harassing or flaming other players 7. No hacking/modding 8. Griefing & Raiding is allowed
[U]Staff Rules[/U]
1. No admin abuse 2. No cursing/swearing 3. Be polite 4. Do not randomly TP to other players 5. Do not use /fly or /gm to help yourself or others [/B] [/size]
[size=5][u]Staff[/u][/size]
[size=4][B][U]Owners:[/U] the_str1nger (EgyptianKing) Cullenjackrat [/B] [/size] [size=5][u]Server Info[/u][/size]
[SIZE=4][B]IP: gobslegendmc.com:25565 Website: http://www.Gobslegend.enjin.com No Hamachi Premium Account Needed Legit Server Version: 1.6.2[/B][/SIZE]
[size=5][u]Future Updates[/u][/size]
[SIZE=4][B]We will update the server from [1.5.2] to [1.6.1] sometime when Bukkit releases the Craftbukkit beta build. Mob & PVP Arenas[/B][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[center][size=24pt][b]Looking For: Moderators, Photoshop Designers, Builders[/b][/size][/center]
